long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feedly.com is a web application allowing users to subscribe to RSS feeds and view items from those feeds. Those feeds belong to various other web sites. With this extension installed when users on Feedly.com view items that originate from those other web sites instead of just seeing the text title of the item they will also see an icon next to the title representing the web site that the item is from. The icon is obtained from the favicon belonging to the web site.
